name: Cosmic Anomaly
description:
This game you make your way through a asteroid field to find Scripty Script because you were hired as a detective to do so. Good luck with the Mario galaxy like physic's while you run around to find him. (Works Best With Controller)

SNHU Game Jam

Theme- Rings

Gameplay Systems - JT Gulick, Joseph Owen

3D Art - Anthony Darggio

2D Art and UI Art - Mark Stuke
